Every month we will share two city Overviews across our feeds!

For our first post, weâre thrilled to feature one of our favorite cities - #Amsterdam. The canal system of the city - known as Grachten - is the result of considered urban planning. In the early 17th century, when immigration was at a peak, a comprehensive plan for the cityâs expansion was developed with four concentric half-circles of canals emerging at the main waterfront. In the centuries since, the canals have been used for defense, water management, and transport.

You can also now use the hashtag #OverviewCityscapes on any Instagram post for a chance to be featured on the @dailyoverview or @superachitects feeds. Aerial shots of your home cities are encouraged!
